title: Michael Goes to Walmart Gaiden: Rise of Yujiro
description: After the death of Asta, Michael stumbles upon another man wanting to grow. Yujiro Hanma, a thirty-year-old shrimp has spent his entire life being bullied and walked all over. Finally getting his chance to grow, he takes it with an iron fist, working with Michael and his crew to become stronger than the average man.
author: Simpacchi, Rukia-dono
